text:
When a document is moved from one area to another (e.g. when a document is
deleted or archived), the workflow information gets removed from the metadata.
Is seems to be related to commit 447411.

The reason for not copying workflow metadata is the following (according to
Andreas):
"the reason was that a new document which is a copy of an existing one
but has a different UUID/language should not start with the same
workflow history, but get a clean one."

However, it shouldn't affect moving documents. 

How to reproduce:
- go to site area
- delete a document
- it cannot be restored anymore:
  the menu option to restore the document is disabled 
  ('workflow event cannot be invoked')
